Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from gp36 membrane proximal external region of FIV)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.30240422]Feline immunodeficiency virus (FIV):inhibition of virus replication in lymphoid cells(IC50>50 Î¼g/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: Elicit antiviral activity by inhibiting the fusion of the FIV and host cell membrane.

Literature.Title: Structural basis of antiviral activity of peptides from MPER of FIV gp36
Literature.Author: Grimaldi M, Stillitano I, Amodio G, Santoro A, Buonocore M, Moltedo O, Remondelli P, D'Ursi AM.
